<@page_overview_title/> <#assign groovy = "org.duguo.xdir.core.internal.template.freemarker.GroovyDirective"?new()> <@groovy> //http://developer.linkedin.com/docs/DOC-1002 //http://developer.linkedin.com/docs/DOC-1061 json=model.app.security.get("oauthlinkedin").requestLoginUrl(model.request,model.pagePath+"/callback"+model.format); model.put("json",json); authUrl = json.loginUrl; if(authUrl.isNull()){ return "Failed to talk to OpenID provider, please try again later."; }else{ model.response.sendRedirect(authUrl.toString()); } return "" <#if !json.loginUrl.isNull()> <#stop "redirected to login"/>
